quest.name: The Horns of the Green
journal: Serendipity has another commission for you.
Once again, Roroton has decided to request your services by name. Craft a high-quality horn staff and present it to Serendipity for inspection.

Gigi and Serendipity both agree that your growth as a goldsmith is undeniable. Since you have not spoken with Roroton in some time, Serendipity suggests that you deliver the staff in person. Seek out the merchant at the Ruby Road Exchange in the Steps of Nald.

Roroton is happy to see you again, and is surprised that you have already finished the staff. Your conversation soon turns to the topic of the Jade Fox, a legendary thief and master of disguise rumored to have come to Ul'dah. Roroton urges you and your guildmates to be careful, as the Jade Fox is known to have a penchant for fine jewelry. Report to Serendipity at the Goldsmiths' Guild and inform her that the commission is complete.

Serendipity congratulates you on another successful assignment, and echoes Roroton's warning about the Jade Fox. However, she states that you need not worry about any commissions made through the Goldsmiths' Guild, as she will personally scrutinize each and every customer. Whether or not her confidence is justified remains to be seen...

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 45.
objectives: Present a horn staff to Serendipity.
Deliver the horn staff to Roroton.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Good to see you again! You'll be pleased to know that Gigi is completely back to normal. Why, when Roroton was here not too long ago, he only had to contend with Gigi's traditional repertoire of insults.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: You know what I mean, I'm sure─that Roroton was a hopeless fool, that he was completely devoid of artistic sensibilities, that he smelt of rolanberries─that sort of thing.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, don't get me wrong; it was still terribly distressing. But, at least there was no more talk of fires.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Anyway, as for why Roroton was here in the first place, he wished to commission you once more─this time, for a horn staff. It goes without saying that he desires a staff of the highest quality, so please bear that in mind before you present your work to me for inspection. Good luck!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, have you finished the horn staff already?

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
HoRn...StAfF...aHa! So ThIs Is GrEeNhOrN's StAfF! yOu ArE iMpRoViNg.

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text: PeRhApS gReEnHoRn HaS fInAlLy OuTgRoWn HeRHiS tItLe! I mUsT tHiNk Of A mOrE sUiTaBlE oNe─SoMeThInG tHaT aCkNoWlEdGeS yOuR rEcEnT gRoWtH, bUt StIlL cOnVeYs DiSdAiN fOr ThE mAjOrItY oF yOuR wOrK.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Hm. That's extremely high praise! At least, I think it is...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But there is one thing that I can say with certainty: this particular commission has made it even easier than usual to evaluate your growth. After all, the fire brand you made before required you to work with many of the same materials, so this is a perfect opportunity to see how your technique has improved since then.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Although both were carved from aldgoat horn and adorned with an eye of fire, I would say that this staff is much more refined by comparison.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: The wolf fangs flaring from the tip are the coup de grâce, not only strengthening the thaumaturgical properties of the weapon, but also improving the wielder's ability to cut an imposing figure!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Why don't you deliver this commission to Roroton at the Ruby Road Exchange personally? It's been a while since you last met, so I'm sure he'd be happy to see you.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: Why, if it isn't Forename! You're a hard womanman to find. As it happens, I had another commission for you. Mistress Serendipity has the details. Or would you prefer that I tell you?

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: You've already crafted the horn staff!? Beg your pardon, I had no idea!

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: I appreciate that you came to deliver it. I was dreading the inevitable encounter with that irrepressible mammet.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: Don't misunderstand─it's not that I'm offended. On the contrary, his assessment of my abilities is harsh but fair. He reminds me that I have much and more to learn before I can call myself a connoisseur of the fine arts.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: And in times like these, ignorance can be a fatal failing─especially if the rumors sweeping the markets are to be given credence.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: Surely you've heard them as well. This talk of the Jade Fox?

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: Aye, the legendary thief has come to Ul'dah at last. A master of disguise, whose identity is a complete mystery. There is but one thing on which everyone can agree: that his lust for fine jewelry is insatiable!

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: So you must understand why a merchant like me would feel ill at ease. There is no greater enemy to the industrious businessman than a dastardly thief who would steal his wares without compunction.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: You and your fellow goldsmiths should take care. In fact, it would not surprise me in the slightest if the Jade Fox were to turn his attentions toward you.

dialogue.name: ROROTON
dialogue.text: Do be careful, Forename. This Jade Fox character is out there somewhere, and any one of us could be his next target.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename! I hope the staff was to Roroton's satisfaction.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Congratulations on a job well done, then! Oh, but before you go, I've recently been informed that a dangerous thief has come to Ul'dah, and that we goldsmiths might be the target of his machina─

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: What? You've already heard about the Jade Fox!? Well now, aren't we well-informed!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Anyway, I must urge you to be cautious when dealing with new customers. The Jade Fox may disguise himself as one in an attempt to defraud you! As for the guild, rest assured that I will personally scrutinize anyone who seeks to commission our goldsmiths. And I am an excellent judge of character!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: What was that? Did I just hear you snicker, Forename!? And I thought you respected your kind and lovely guildmaster...

obj.n: The Fox in the Hen House
